channel.title: [Throwback Thursday Content Post] Roots -Thrashie
channel.description:
So I thought I might experiment with post ideas while I finish the album so I’m gonna try this. The song itself is somewhat new and a bit old mainly because this was made as a nod to my old alias “RainbroThrash” and sound I had back then. (Gossip spammer lol) Anyway here you go. Hope you enjoy ^-^
https://soundcloud.com/rainbrothrash/roots

item.title: [Throwback Thursday Content Post] Roots -Thrashie
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Real cool! I don’t think there’s anything I’ve heard from you I didn’t like though.

All I can say is keep doing what you’re doing because it is sonically interesting, very textural. Which plays hard into my wheelhouse

Read full topic
